name: Music Maze (thiscris)
description:
Music Maze (alpha)

My entry for the HODUR sound based jam 2019.

Assist over the phone a janitor for an amusement park.

This is a work in progress. Hopefully I will find enough time to do better recordings

Audio collected from:

MID files from https://dripchord.com/

Music from MDN web audio example

Voice synthesis from http://notevibes.com/

Notification sound from freesounds.org
